location.physicalLocation: British Library: India Office Records and Private Papers

titleInfo.title: Letter from William Bruce, Acting Resident at Bushire to Neil Benjamin Edmonstone, Chief Secretary to Government, Fort William, Calcutta

physicalDescription.extent: The enclosure for this letter can be found on folio 124v.

mods.abstract: The letter is enclosing a copy and translation (see f. 124v) of a letter from Mahomed Nebbe Kaun [Muḥammad Nabī Khān] requesting the payment of his pension to Aga Mahomed Kaudee, a merchant of Bushire. The letter further encloses a set of exchange for this payment.
